name: api.mapserv.utah.gov
description: 1. create a webapi website in iis. point it to webapi.api and filter all requests to webapi. 1. create a dashboard website in iis. point it to webapi.dashboard and filter all requests to dashboard. 1. install raven db 1. import a raven dump 1. install redis from https://github.com/MSOpenTech/redis/releases
